name: Celery Salt
author: CarolynCooks
summary: Make your own celery salt using leftover celery leaves! Using the microwave to dry them preserves the fresh taste and color. Plus, you can choose your favorite salt and avoid commercial additives. Store in an airtight shaker. Allow to sit for a week or two before using for optimal flavor.
ingredients: ½ cup loosely-packed celery leaves, cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Line a microwave-safe plate with a paper towel
Place celery leaves in a single layer and cover with a second paper towel
Microwave leaves, rearranging if needed, in 30-second intervals until dry and crispy
Measure out 2 tablespoons of dried leaves and crumble with your fingers
Add to salt and mix well
Briefly pulse in a spice grinder if desired
